name: Post-Umi
description:
"You wake up in your room, trashed after an insane party. You don’t recall anything of what happened last night before you passed out drunk. The only thing you realize is that you’re locked inside and can’t find the key to the front door anywhere."

"Post-Umi" is a graphic adventure that tells the story of a man between 20 and 30 that has a difficult relationship with someone in his life, he lost himself and the value of this love/affection. The party that happened the night before the start of the game symbolizes the lowest point that he reaches and interacting with objects around him, he will relive the past to remember what happened last night and where is the key but delving into his memories turns into a journey to find again his emotions, values and relationships.

Commands:
Left-Click for interact

Right-Click for move
